name: gummy bear amigurumi
notes:
create an adorable gummy bear with this no-sew crochet pattern! featuring clever bobble stitches for the arms, legs, nose, and ears, this design is both quick and fun to make. 

the original bear was made with worsted weight yarn and measures approximately 4.5 cm when finished, but if you use chenille or blanket yarn with a larger hook, you'll get a larger, extra-plush gummy bear! 

perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike, the pattern includes a [step-by-step video tutorial][1] on youtube to guide you through the process. 

tips and techniques to try:

* use the [yarn under single crochet][2] for tighter and more aligned stitches.
* use the [ultimate finish][3] to close up the amigurumi
* crochet in continuous rounds without joining and use a [running stitch marker][4] to keep track of your rounds

make your own squishy, seamless gummy bear today!


  [1]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9mgjut8mx0m
  [2]: https://www.onceuponacheerio.com/2022/05/how-to-yarn-under-single-crochet.html
  [3]: https://www.onceuponacheerio.com/2023/04/close-amigurumi-ultimate-finish.html
  [4]: https://www.onceuponacheerio.com/2023/04/how-to-use-running-stitch-marker.html
